With the thought of generating more income and being able to offer his customers a greater variety of products, Abdullah wants to increase the stock of products that he has. However, he does not have enough capital to be able to buy the products from his providers. He therefore requested a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB, which will give him the opportunity to buy food staples in order to stock his store and offer his customers a greater variety. 

He hopes that with the loan, he will be able to increase his sales because he will be offering his customers more products. He hopes to be able to give his family a better quality of life and greater possibilities for progress.

loans.use: to buy food staples in order to stock his store and offer his customers a greater variety.

loans.name: Goadalupe

texts.es:
Goadalupe tiene 58 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Morropon, una ciudad conocida por el tradicional baile del Tondero, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores caprinos, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de alimentos balanceados y compra de cerdos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos paras su familia.
texts.en:
Goadalupe, 58, lives with his wife in the district of Morropon, a city known for the traditional dance of Tondero. The people in the area, part of the Piura region on the north coast of Peru, work in agriculture, livestock and commerce.

Goadalupe raises and sells small animals like goats. He has asked for a loan of 3000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed and to buy pigs to offer his customers, so that he can generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and balanced feed to fatten the animals.

loans.name: Ganijon

texts.ru: Ганичон молодой человек в возрасте 22 проживающий в Худжанде. Худжанд город, где гостеприимные горожане, прекрасный и приятный климат. Худжанде горожане славятся своей культурой и много летними неизменяемыми традициями. И один из таких жителей Худжанда является Ганичон. Ганичон не женатый молодой человек. Он живет вместе с родителями и братом. Ганичон активный и целеустремленный человек. Он занимается предоставлением услуги такси. В этой деятельности он уже 3 года.  Ему нравится его работа. Сейчас он решил купить новую машину. Ганичон продаст старую машину и на сбережения, добавит сумму от кредита и приобретет новую и продолжит деятельность. Ганичон верит, что ему помогут. Ведь мир не без добрых людей.
texts.en: Ganijon is a 22-year old man living in Khujand. Khujand is a friendly town with a wonderful pleasant client. The inhabitants of Khujand are known for  preserving their ancient cultural traditions. Ganijon is one of these locals. He is single and lives together with his parents and brother. He is an energetic and goal-oriented person. He has been providing taxi services for three years. He likes his work. Now he decided to buy a new car. Ganijon will sell his old car and use his savings as well as the funds from his loan to buy another car and continue his work. Ganijon trusts that he will get help: after all, the world is not without good people.

loans.use: to buy a new car for providing a taxi service in Khujand.

loans.name: Merlyncy

texts.en:
Merlyncy is 55 years old and lives in Balintawak, Pagadian City. She is married with four children.                    

Merlyncy has a shop that sells grocery products. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of 6,500 PHP to pay for grocery items for her store.                                                                                  

Merlyncy has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Merlyncy hopes to be able to sell grocery products in the neighboring barangay (village).

loans.use: To pay for grocery items for her store

loans.name: Monserat

texts.en:
Monserat is 54 years old and lives in Balintawak, Pagadian City. She is married with five children.                    

Monserat has a shop that sells grocery products. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to purchase additional inventory for her grocery business.                                                                      

Monserat has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Monserat hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for her grocery business

loans.name: Ramiro Enrique

texts.es: Ramiro de 66 años de edad habita en casa muy sencilla junto a sus hijos mayores de edad y un nieto de 5 años. Ramiro trabaja como ordenanza de una institución cercana a su localidad desde hace mucho tiempo, de esta forma ha sacado adelante a sus hijos y sigue colaborando con los gastos del hogar.Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la elaboración del corredor de la vivienda ya que desea cerrarlo y así contar con mayor seguridad y comodidad. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
Ramiro, 66, lives in a very simple house together with his grown children and one grandchild, 5 years old. Ramiro has worked as an administrative assistant at an institution near his home for a long time. This is how he has taken care of his children and contributes to the household costs.

He asks for this loan from FUSAI to build a hallway in his home because he wants to close it off and have greater security and comfort. He will use the loan to buy wood and galvanized tin.

loans.use: to buy galvanized tin and wood.

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
Amelita, age 43, buys and sells clothing items to earn a living. She has been engaged in this business for the past five years and earns approximately PhP 5,000 per month. 

She is divorced and lives with her two children in Maloro, Tangub City.
 
Amelita has requested a loan in order to buy inventory items for her business. She has been a member of PMPC for three years.
 
In the future, Amelita hopes to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy clothing items to offer for sale

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is a 22-year-old, married woman. She is the mother of two young children, and they live in Panglao, Bohol. Joan engages in fishing. She sells fish and sea shells to the community. Aside from fishing, she is also in a hog-raising business. These are the sources of her income.

She is requesting a loan to buy additional piglets and pig feed. This will enable her to grow and to sell more pigs, at a particular period. Joan hopes to expand both businesses and make them successful.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and pig feed

loans.name: Las Lomas De San Juan Group

texts.es: El grupo “Las Lomas De San Juan”  está conformado por 08 socios comprometidos y responsables que poco a poco han ido mejorando por el bienestar de sus familias. Este es el caso de Carmen de 26 años casada y tiene 01 hijo dependiente. Carmen se dedica a la compra de pollos donde luego son distribuidas en mercados y tiendas, este negocio lo realiza juntamente con su madre. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de pollos, pues tiene pedidos por entregar. El deseo de Carmen es de seguir trabajando positivamente. El grupo “Las Lomas De San Juan” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada. Carmen se encuentra de pie, es la primera del lado derecho y viste polo rojo con rayas.
texts.en:
The group Las Lomas de San Juan comprises eight members who are committed and responsible. Little by little, they have all made improvements for their families' wellbeing. 

That is the case for Carmen, who is 26 years old and married with one minor child. Carmen works buying chickens, which she later distributes to markets and stores. She runs her business alongside her mother. She is requesting this loan to buy chickens because she has pending orders to deliver. Carmen's desire is to continue working positively. 

The group Las Lomas de San Juan is grateful to Kiva lenders for the help they provide. 

Carmen is standing in the picture. She is the first person from the right, wearing a striped top.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goods for her kiosk such as sugar, coffee, cooking oil and kitchen equipment.

loans.name: Joaquina

texts.en:
Joaquina is 53 years old and lives in Dela Paz, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children. 

Joaquina earns a living from her gardening activity particularly growing string beans, mongo, okra, and pechay and from banana production. Joaquina earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing seven sacks of fertilizers and chemical sprays for her gardening activity. 

Joaquina has been a member of PMPC for nine years. In the future, Joaquina hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase 7 sacks of fertilizers and chemical sprays

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more oil, onions, etc., for her business,

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more artificial hair for her hair dressing business

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a married woman. She has six school-going children. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwanamisi has operated a vegetable stall business for the last three years, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a challenge of stiff competition from other vegetable operators in her business.
 
With the KES 20,000, she wants to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits, and green vegetables for resale. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits, and green vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Bessy Marleny

texts.es:
Bessy es una joven de 28 años de edad, ama de casa en un estado civil de unión libre, madre de un hijo quien es menor de edad y solo ellos tres viven en casa. Su ingreso económico depende de la agricultura la siembra de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y café. Su experiencia de 4 años junto a su compañero de hogar a quien ella apoya diariamente en el campo pero fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad ya que ellos por vocación familiar dependen del trabajo de campo por generaciones. El terreno que poseen es propio el cual está ubicado muy cerca de su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan caminando para dar la asistencia necesaria para que sus cultivos de granos básicos estén al 100% para la cosecha.
Sus planes para el futuro poder tecnificar sus cultivos de granos básicos implementando un sistema de riego por goteo, ampliar más sus cultivos mediante la compra de más tierra y poder sembrar una variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas e implementarlos en el mantenimiento de sus cultivos que incluye la fertilización, limpieza más la mano de obra. Con los insumos que mediante este financiamiento obtendrá Bessy espera una buena producción, un excelente resultado y al final de todo mayores ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Bessy is a young woman of 28. She is a housewife and lives in a free union relationship. She is the mother of a son who is a minor, and only the three of them live in their home. Their economic income depends on agriculture, plantings of basic foodstuffs such as corn, beans, and coffee. She has four years of experience working with her partner, whom she helps in the field every day, but it was her parents who taught her to work the land at a very early age, since by family tradition they have depended on farm work for generations. The land that they work is their own, and it is located very close to their home, so they walk there to give the needed care so that their crops of basic foods are at 100% for the harvest.

Her plans for the future are to modernize their plantings of basic foods using a system of drip irrigation, further expand their plantings by purchasing more land, and being able to plant a variety to offer her customers.

For these reasons, she is now applying for a loan to buy agricultural supplies and use them in maintaining her plantings, which includes fertilizing, weeding, and labor. With the supplies that she will obtain through this loan, Bessy expects to have good production, an excellent bottom line, and in the end, better income for the sustenance of her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay for labor to help care for her plantings of basic foods

loans.name: Maria Paula

texts.es: Ella es maria paula, estudiante de campo alto en el programa de auxiliar de enfermería, su sueño es estudiar medicina, pero por recursos económicos no puede ingresar a la universidad, a si que empezó a buscar otros medios y llego a la conlcusion de que tenía que tener una base fundamental la cual le abrira puertas en el mundo laboral y a si poder costear con los gastos de la carrera profesional, al ver que campo alto le daba facilidad de pago, por cuotas, vio que podía empezar a escalar rumbo al sueño con este programa, ahora esta en tercer semestre, lista para ingresara a practicas y poder reforzar y aprender nuevos cosas en las ramas de la salud, desde muy pequeña le ha gustado todo lo referido con la salud, salvar vidas, ayudar al necesitado y estar al margen sobre todos los avances, es una persona que no se rinde a pesar de las adversidades, y por eso lo hace, por cumplir todo lo que se propone y poder ayudar a la comunidad, la mama es su mayor motivación ya que toda la vida ha sido la única que responde por ella, es madre soltera, cabeza de familia, luchadora por el bienestar de su hija, y otro de los sueños es poder responder por la mama como ella lo ha hecho por ella, los primos menores y que ella sea un ejemplo para ellos, quiere darles las bases para que cuando culminen los estudios en bachillerato puedan continuar con el camino universitario y profesional, y a si ayudarlos económicamente y poder decirles que empezando desde abajo se triunfa mejor.
texts.en:
Maria Paula is a CampoAlto student in the nursing assistant program. Her dream is to study medicine, but for economic reasons she is not able to go to university. She looked for other options and came to the conclusion that she needed a basis in fundamentals that would open doors for her in the work world so that she could pay for the costs of a professional career.

Maria Paula discovered that CampoAlto offered easy payments, by installments, and that she could start the path to her dream with this program. Now she is in her third semester and is ready to begin her practical training to reinforce what she has learned and to learn new things in the various branches of healthcare. Since she was very young, she has liked everything related to healthcare, such as saving lives, helping those in need, and being at the cutting edge of new advances.

Maria Paula is a person who does not give up despite adversity, and for this reason she plans to complete everything she has set out for herself to accomplish and to help her community. Her mother is her greatest motivation, because all her life her mother has been the only one to look out for her. Maria Paula’s mother is a single mother, who has needed to be head of her family and to fight for her daughter’s welfare. Another of Maria Paula’s dreams is to be able to look after her mother the way her mother has looked after her.

Maria Paula would also like to look after her young cousins and to be an example for them. She wants to give them a foundation so that when they finish high school they can continue on to university and become professionals. Maria Paula would like to help them economically, and to teach them that success is even greater when one starts from behind.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more sugar, flour, wood and other items for her business

loans.name: Anacleto

texts.en:
Anacleto is a  married man from Talibon, Bohol. He has five children.He has been engaged in a fishing business for more than ten years now. This is the source of his income. 

Anacleto is asking for a loan to buy fishing materials such as fishing net, nylon and rope. With these, he will be able to improve his catch thus giving him more fish to sell in the market. Anacleto hopes to make his business a success. Moreover, he wants to save money for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials, such as fishing net, nylon and rope

loans.name: Piadel

texts.en:
Piadel, 29, is engaged in selling fish, in the village. She also sells in the market, to increase her earnings. Piadel aspires to live a good life through her business. But, without capital, her business will not go well, and she may not achieve a good income for better living.

Piadel is now requesting additional capital of PHP 5,000, which she will use to buy more fish and a bigger Styrofoam container. She knows that through her requested loan, she could improve her income and attain her objectives in life.

loans.use: to buy more fish and a bigger Styrofoam container, to use for her fish-selling business

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is married with two children. She is 43 years old and lives in Baybay, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Leonora sells ukay-ukay (used clothing) to earn a living and has had this business for ten years. Each month, she earns 6,000 to 7,000 PHP doing this type of business. She has requested a loan for 25,000 PHP to purchase more bundles of ukay-ukay  for retail.

Leonora has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more bundles of ukay-ukay (used clothing)

location.town: Liloy- Baybay Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: 1Ero De Mayo Group

texts.es:
Estela es otro de los integrantes del grupo 1ero de mayo, ella tiene la edad de 38 años, estudio secundaria, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estela se dedica a la venta de y elaboración de ropa y zapatos tejidos, platica que aprendió a hacer estas manualidades cuando era soltera y desde que se casó, decidió continuar a vender sus creaciones y hasta ahora, ha tenido buenos resultados ya que esta haciendo más clientes y sus productos se continúan vendiendo. Estela lleva 8 años realizando su actividad y ha solicitado este crédito ya que quiere resurtirse comprando variedad de hilos y suelas para continuar con su producción. Ella espera que su negocio continué creciendo para poder darle a sus dos hijos la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera y mejorar su calidad de vida. 

Los demás integrantes del grupo son:

Araceli venta de antojitos mexicanos 
Braulia venta de ropa 
Adela venta de calzado y lencería 
Luis Ricardo farmacia 
Alejo tienda de abarrotes  
Rosa Isela venta de ropa 
Mónica venta de comida 
Selene club de nutrición
texts.en:
Estela is another member of the Primero de Mayo (First of May) group. She is 38 years old, has a secondary school education, is married, and has two children. She makes a living by making and selling woven clothing and shoes. She tells us that she learned how to make these things when she was single and, after she got married, she decided to continue to sell her creations. Until now, she has had good results because she is gaining more customers and continuing to sell her products. 

Estela has been working in this business for 8 years. She has requested this loan because she wants to restock her business and purchase a variety of thread and soles to continue production. She hopes that her business will continue to grow so that she can provide her two children with the opportunity to study a career and improve their quality of life.

The other members of the group are:

Araceli: sells "antojitos" (Mexican snacks)
Braulia: sells clothing 
Adela: sells footwear and lingerie 
Luis Ricardo: pharmacy 
Alejo: grocery store
Rosa Isela: sells clothing 
Mónica: sells food 
Selene: nutrition club

loans.use: to purchase a variety of thread and soles.

loans.name: Dinora Del Carmen

texts.es: Dinora de 45 años de edad desde hace 23 años posee un taller de costura ubicado en su lugar de residencia, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus tres  hijos ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, es una mujer increíble y muy ejemplar  ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable y positiva, además, muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona y de su trabajo. Elabora variedad de prendas de vestir  a precios muy accesibles. También ofrece calidad en su trabajo, razón por la cual muchas personas la prefieren, ya cuenta  con clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para  invertir en su pequeño negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: telas, hilos, elástico, etc. para la elaboración de variedad de prendas de vestir. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de dar un mejor servicio a los clientes de tal forma que los clientes se sientan motivados a seguir solicitando sus servicios y así sus ventas e ingresos se vean incrementados. Espera lograr su objetivo y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Dinora is 45 years old and has managed a sewing workshop in her home for 23 years. She lives in her own house along with her three children. In addition to sewing and selling clothes, Dinora is a farmer. She is an incredible woman who sets a good example because she is hardworking, responsible, and positive. Many people have provided good references that attest to her character and her work.

Dinora makes a variety of clothes and offers them at very affordable prices. There is also quality in her work. For this reason, many people prefer to do business with her. She already has established customers who come to her each day.

Dinora decided to request a loan so that she can invest in her small business. She will buy needed supplies such as fabric, thread, elastic, and other items for making a variety of clothes. Dinora is doing all of this so that she can provide better service to her customers since they provide her the motivation to continue her work. As a result, her sales and income will increase. She hopes to accomplish her goal and improve the quality of life for herself and her children.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, and other supplies.

loans.name: Lorena Esperanza

texts.es: Lorena Esperanza solicita el crédito para cambiar el techo de su vivienda, desea ponerlo de Zinc. Lorena es casada, su esposo trabaja en construcción. Tiene 3 hijos, dos de los cuales son independientes a ella. Lorena trabaja en una oficina, y también renta habitaciones en su vivienda. Su sueño es poder construir su casa de dos pisos, para lo cual junto a su esposo trabaja arduamente día a día.
texts.en: Lorena Esperanza is applying for the loan to change the roof of her home. She wants to put on galvanized roofing. Lorena is married. Her husband works in construction. They have three children, two of whom are independent. Lorena works in an office, and she also rents rooms in her home. Her dream is to be able to construct a two-story home, for which, along with her husband, she works hard every day.

loans.use: to buy galvanized roofing sheets and purlins to change the roof of her home

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is married with three children. She is 50 years old and lives in Sta. Cruz Tangub City.

To earn a living, Lilia has a snack vending business. She has had this business for ten years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 6,000. Lilia has been a member of PMPC for six years and took several loans already. In need of funds, she reached PMPC for a loan. She applied to purchase materials for renovation of her house. 

In the future, Lilia hopes to own a sari-sari store in which she wants to display her goods.

loans.use: to purchase materials for renovation of her house

location.town: Tangub-Sta. Cruz, Tangub, City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Esmeralda De Jesús

texts.es:
Esmeralda de 59 años de edad,  dado a la situación económica de sus padres no pudo estudiar, por lo que ademas es madre soltera y solo vive con una hija y una nieta ; su hija es la que le ayuda a trabajar mientras la pequeña estudia, esas serian las personas que dependen de ella.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura, la cual tiene mucha experiencia en dicha actividades  toda su vida se a dedicado  a dicha  profesión, ademas de la agricultura tiene una pequeña crianza de pollo. La señora todos los días se levanta a las 5:a m a darle de comer a los pollos y luego camina unos 10 minutos, para llegar donde tiene el cultivo, trabaja hasta las 10 dela mañana actividades que la a compaña su hija.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar  fertilizantes para sus cultivos( semilla, abono y pesticidas),  comida para los pollos. Elle dice que el préstamo le sera de mucho beneficio, dado que podrá tener mejores cultivosde los cuales espera mejores rendimientos y obtener mas ganancias y a si poder tener mejores condiciones económicas y alimentarias.

 Los sueños de Esmeralda son poder mejorar su vivienda ,preparar académica mente a su nieta ya que a su hija no le pudo dar estudio y poder seguir trabajando para que esto se le haga realidad y gracias a los créditos espera lograrlos.
texts.en:
Esmeralda is 59 years old. Due to her parent's economic situation, she was not able to go to school, and on top of this she is a single mother and only lives with one of her daughters and a granddaughter. Her daughter helps her to work while the little one is studying. These are the people who depend on her.

Esmeralda works in agriculture, and has a lot of experience in these activities since she has spent her whole life working in this profession. In addition to agriculture, she also raises some chickens. She gets up at 5am every day to feed her chickens and then she walks about 10 minutes to the place where she grows her crops. She works until 10 in the morning and her daughter helps out.

Esmeralda is requesting this loan in order to buy fertilizers for her crops (seeds, manure and pesticides) and chicken feed. She says that the loan will be very beneficial, because it will help her to grow better crops. She hopes to have better yields and earn more profits so as to have better economic conditions and nutrition.

Esmeralda's dreams are to improve her home, provide a good education for her granddaughter since she wasn't able to send her own daughter to school, and to continue working so that these dreams come true. Thanks to her loans she hopes to achieve these dreams.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her crops (seeds, manure, and pesticides) and chicken feed.

loans.name: Khonzoda

texts.ru: Хонзода немолодая 55-летняя женщина. Она очень деятельная и предприимчивая женщина. Сейчас она решила открыть свой торговый бизнес. Она заинтересована в купле и продаже женской одежды. Хонзода уже приобрела помещение на рынке своего района Кургантюбе. Она берет кредит в размере 2000 долларов США, так как собственного сбережения не хватает. Хонзода планирует оптом привозить товар с рынка города Душанбе и продавать по розничной цене в своей торговой точке в районе Кургантюбе. Хонзоде в новом бизнесе будут помогать сыновья. Она решительно настроена на успех.
texts.en: Khonzoda is an older woman of 55. She is a very active and enterprising woman. She has decided to open a shop. She is interested in buying and selling  women's clothing. Khonzoda already has a stall in her local market in Qurgan-Tube. She is taking out a $2,000 loan, since she doesn't have enough savings. Khonzoda plans to buy goods wholesale from the market in Dushanbe and resell at a retail in her shop in Qurgan. Khonzoda's new business will help her children. She is determined to succeed.

loans.use: buy seasonal women's clothing to start a business.

loans.name: Maria Imelda

texts.es: Maria de 58 años de edad se dedica  a la venta de granos básicos desde hace varios  años, posee mucha clientela pues un producto muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo quien es agricultor, su hija  y sus tres nietos, Doña Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor y así abastecerse con mas productos para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 58 years old and has been selling basic staples for several years. Since there is a great demand for the products she sells, Maria has many customers as a result of her work. By working with her husband, she is able to cover some of the household expenses. Maria lives in her home with her husband, who is a farmer, and also with her daughter and her three grandchildren.

Doña Maria is requesting a loan so that she can buy more merchandise in bulk. This will enable her to restock with more products so that she can generate more income and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, corn, and other products in bulk.

loans.name: Las Poderosas De Ventanilla Alta Group

texts.es: Yanina es una de las socias de la alcancía LAS PODEROSAS DE VENTANILLA ALTA  ella tiene 30 años es casada y tiene 3 hijos. Si bien es cierto su esposo trabaja como obrero muchas veces el dinero no alcanza debido a eso decidió apoyarlo trabajando,  hace 2 años empezó su propio negocio una tienda de abarrotes donde trabaja diariamente sus mejores clientes son sus vecinas quienes diariamente acuden a comprarle. Con el dinero de su préstamo podrá adquirir productos para su tienda, gracias a su préstamo puede  tener la tranquilidad de seguir trabajando para apoyar a su familia.Yannina desea seguir creciendo y mas adelante le gustaría abrir otra tienda con el mismo rubro, agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA por el préstamo para ella y todo su grupo comunal, en la foto es la ultima de la izquierda viste falda floreada.
texts.en:
Yanina is one of the members of the Communal Bank "Las Poderosas de Ventanilla Alta". She is 30 years old, married, and has three children. Although her husband works as a laborer, there is often times not enough money. For this reason, she decided to help him by working. Yanina started her own business two years ago. She has a grocery store and works each day to serve her best customers, which include her neighbors who visit daily in order to make purchases.

The money from her loan will be used to acquire products for her store. Thanks to these funds, she will have the peace of mind that she needs to continue working in order to support her family. Yanina wants to keep growing and would like to open another store going forward that offers the same products. On behalf of herself and the rest of her Communal Bank, she would like to thank the Kiva lenders for this loan. In the photo, Yanina is the last person on the row wearing a floral skirt.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more onions, rice, pepper, salt, etc to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar, butter, etc for her bread business.

loans.name: María Milagro

texts.es:
María de 26 años de edad, logro estudiar hasta sexto grado, de su familia es la que más se preparó, ya que sus hermanos no tuvieron la misma oportunidad y tuvieron que incorporarse a temprana edad a las labores productivas en la agricultura y otros emigraron a Estados Unidos buscando mejores empleos. Dejando como última opción el estudiar. Esta joven está acompañada y tiene un hijo de tres años.
María se dedica al comercio, vendiendo ropa y cosméticos, esto los comercializa pasando casa por casa en el cantón y sus alrededores, también vende por encargo.
Realiza esta actividad desde hace 7 años, por lo cual es bien conocida en estos lugares por los clientes. Antes, de dedicarse al comercio solamente se limitaba a realizar los quehaceres del hogar.
El préstamo lo necesita para surtir el negocio de ropa y cosméticos, ya que en esta época navideña hay muchos pedidos y en este momento no cuenta con el suficiente capital para aprovechar la oportunidad que se presenta; oportunidad de obtener mejores ingresos por la demanda que hay en estos meses de sus productos.
Sueña con poseer su propia sala de belleza, que además de vender artículos de belleza, también brindar servicios para el cuido de la salud y belleza.
Para lograr esto desea capacitarse sobre esta área y ahorrar para contar con el local y equipo adecuado.
texts.en:
Maria, who is 26 years old, managed to go to school through the sixth grade. Of her family, she is the one who studied the longest, since her siblings did not have the same opportunity,. They had to begin productive labor in agriculture at an early age, and others emigrated to the United States seeking better employment, leaving studying as a last resort. This young woman has a partner and a three-year-old son.

Maria works in commerce, selling clothing and cosmetics. She sells these going door to door in the canton and its outskirts. She also sells through orders. She has been doing this work for 7 years, and so she is well known in these places by her customers. Before working in commerce, she limited herself to doing household tasks.

She needs the loan to stock her clothing and cosmetics business, since at this Christmas season there are many orders, and at this time she doesn't have sufficient capital to take advantage of the opportunity that exists, the opportunity to obtain better income because of the demand that exists for her products in these months.

She dreams of having her own beauty salon, where in addition to selling beauty products, she would also offer services for the care of health and beauty. To achieve this, she wants to train in this area and save to have the location and appropriate equipment.

loans.use: to stock her clothing and cosmetics business, since in the Christmas season there are many orders, and at this time she doesn't have sufficient capital to take advantage of the opportunity

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional red oil, bitter ball, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, and flour to sell

loans.name: Diana Mileidy

texts.es:
Ella es diana mileidy, estudia auxiliar de enfermería porque quiere ayudar a las personas cuando mas lo necesiten y porque después de una experiencia personal salio con la profesión,a parte de ayudar a su comunidad también estudia para ayudarle a la familia en especial a la mama ya que ella le ha brindado toda la ayuda posible para que la hija estudie lo que a ella le apasiona, y a si ayudarle a su mama económicamente. Ella estudia para ser una gran profesional y seguir escalando en el área de la salud tener los recursos suficientes para estudiar medicina y especializare en pediatría y asi ayudar a madres que lo necesitan.
Esta con este convenio ya que es un paso posible para su mama que es madre cabeza de hogar poder pagar estas cuotas, ella va para tercer semestre, un gran logro para ella y va a pasar hoja de vida para contrato y a si lograr aprender mas y dar un buen servicio en el hospital donde la asignen y poder seguir pagando la carrera y no colocar tanto peso a la mama, ella quiere que su familia y comunidad estén felices por el gran paso que ella esta dando y saber que pueden contar con ella cuando la necesiten. El convenio que esta brindando una ayuda para que ella pueda salir adelante y sacar su futuro adelante es muy bueno y no es tan cómodo pero esto le ayuda mucho. Esta feliz por aprender mas sobre el área de la salud y siempre le ha gustado estudiar esto desde que se encontraba en el colegio, ahora esta mas que segura y dispuesta a continuar estudiando.
texts.en:
Diana Mileidy is studying to be a nursing assistant because she wants to help people when they most need it. She also chose this profession because of a personal experience. In addition to helping her community, she is also studying to help her family. She would especially like to help her mother economically, because her mother has helped her as much as possible so that she could study what she was passionate about.

Diana Mileidy is studying to be a great professional and to continue working her way up in the field of healthcare. She would like to have enough resources to study medicine and specialize in pediatrics so that she can help mothers who need it.

Diana Mileidy was able to choose this program because her mother – who is head of her household – was able to afford its installment payments. Diana Mileidy is now in her third semester, which is a great achievement for her. She is now going to circulate her resume to find a work placement, where she will learn more and do good work for the hospital to which she is assigned. She will also be able to pay for her career and help her mother with its cost.

Diana Mileidy would like her family and her community to be happy for the big step she is taking, and for them to know that they can count on her when they need to. The program that is helping her get ahead and build her future is very good, but not easy, which helps her a lot. She is happy to learn more about the field of healthcare, which she has always liked to study, ever since she was in elementary school. Now she is very confident and eager to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Marvie

texts.en:
Marvie, age 48, is a loving mother of two children and the wife of a tricycle operator. While her husband manages their transport business to earn an income, Marvie buys and sells fish.

Marvie would like to repair their motorized tricycle and add to her supply of fish for sale. But her capital is not enough. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000. She hopes that her business will succeed someday. She and her husband are working together to obtain one aim, which is to increase their income. In this way, she could help secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell and to repair the vehicle that they use in the transport business.

loans.name: Noradyn

texts.en:
Noradyn is a 33-year-old, married woman, and a mother of five children. She lives at Panglao, Bohol. Her youngest child is 2, while the oldest is 14 years old. She goes fishing and sells fish. Aside from fishing, she raises hogs. In addition, she also prepares and sells food, to augment the family's income. She sells snack foods at a nearby school.

Noradyn is asking for a loan to buy pig feed, piglets, and more supplies for her food vending business, like flour, sugar, and other ingredients.

Noradyn hopes to expand her business and make it a success, for her children's welfare.

loans.use: to buy pig feed, piglets, and more supplies for her food vending business, like flour, sugar, and other ingredients

loans.name: Teretess

texts.en: Teretess, 43, sells dried fish as a source of income. During this rainy season, she is in need of more capital because she can’t dry her own fish for sale. Thus, she is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase dried fish from other villages.Through her business, she is able to gain an average of PHP 300 every selling time, which is not enough to cover all her household expenses.Teretess is hoping that her requested loan will be granted for her to secure her family's future and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase dried fish to sell

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.ru:
Владимир – из Павлограда. Он более 10 лет занимается выездной торговлей, продавая сезонную женскую обувь. Бизнес у Владимира налаженный, опыт работы солидный. 
Этой зимой Владимир планирует реализовывать зимнюю женскую обувь из кожзаменителя, которая доступна большинству покупательниц, рассчитана на средний класс и хорошо расходится. Для закупки дополнительной партии этой обуви разных моделей Владимиру нужна сумма в 20 000 гривен.
texts.en:
Vladimir is from Pavlograd. He has more than ten years of experience in sales. He sells women's shoes in season. Vladimir's business is established, and he has solid experience.

This winter Vladimir plans to sell women's winter shoes made ​​of artificial leather, which is affordable to most shoppers. This is calculated to appeal to the middle class with good results.  Vladimir needs 20,000 hryvnia to buy more shoes of different styles.

loans.use: purchase imitation leather boots wholesale.

loans.name: Johna

texts.en:
Johna sells cosmetics and other personal care products to members of her community to earn a living. She has been engaged in this retail business for several years now. 

Johna and her husband have one child.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more stock to sell, such as lotion, perfume, and cosmetics. With this investment, she will be able to improve her sales, thus augmenting her income.

loans.use: to buy more stock to offer for sale, such as lotion, perfume, and cosmetics

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia vive con su mama, papa y hermana, está estudiando la carrera de Licenciatura en Pedagógica, y comenta que su sueño es Terminar la carrera pedagógica, ser buena profesional, independiente, y poder ayudar a las personas carenciadas.
Dice también que le gustaría poder ayudar a su familia en la forma que ellos se merecen, un motivo más por el cual ella se está esmerando bastante.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, que le será de gran ayuda en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Patricia lives with her mother, father, and sister. She is studying for a degree in Education. Patricia says that her dream is to finish her degree, become a successful professional, be independent, and be able to help people in need. She says that she would also like to help her family in the way that they deserve. Another reason for pursuing a degree is that she wants to do her best.

Patricia is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the payment of her degree expenses, which will be of great help with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for her university expenses.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta de 56 años de edad habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su esposo quien se gana la vida como jornalero. Marta se dedica a la elaboración de bordados en manta, bisutería y variedad de productos de lana. Es una mujer muy creativa quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento diario. Desea mejorar su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de la materia prima (hilo, agujas, lana, mantas, etc.) para la elaboración de sus productos y así luego poner a la venta.
texts.en:
Marta is 56 years old and lives in very humble conditions with her husband, who works as a day laborer. Marta works embroidering blankets as well as making costume jewelry and a variety of products made of wool. She is a very creative woman who does everything in her power to make a living and meet her family’s daily needs.

Marta would like to improve her business, which is why she is requesting this loan of FUSAI to buy primary materials such as thread, needles, wool and blankets. She will use these to make her products, which she will then offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, wool and blankets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.es:
Doña Celsa tiene una edad de 43 años, es madre de 5 hijos muy laboriosa, quienes el mayor esta casados en hogar a parte, el menor de todos estudia en la primaria en la escuela de la comunidad y los otros 3 hermanos ayudan a su padre en las diferentes actividades del campo. Doña Celsa no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar ya que desciende de una familia humildemente económica pero muy trabajadora enseñándole lo más importante en la vida, valores morales, espirituales. Ella agradece a Dios todo poderoso por la familia que tiene ya que a pesar de no haber asistido a la escuela en casa gracias al apoyo de sus hijas ella ha aprendido a leer y escribir teniendo la fe de seguir aprendiendo cada día más. La tierra que ella y su familia trabajan es propia gracias al esfuerzo y sacrificio por muchos años. Con una experiencia de más de 14 años en compañía de su esposo ella también se dedica a la cría de cerdos y tiene una vaca lechera con la que produce en pequeña cantidad algunos derivados de la leche para generar más ingresos a la familia.
Sus planes poder cultivar una variedad diferente de producto que ayude a generar mayores ganancias como el maíz y frijoles, implementar un sistema de riego de goteo o con mariposa ya que en la aldea donde ella vive el agua es abundante y limpia, entre otros. 
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de café mismos que ayudaran a dar paso a sus metas, planes, sueños y su hoy en día compromiso.
texts.en:
Doña Celsa is 43 years old, and a hard-working mother of 5 children; the oldest is married and living away from home, the youngest attends primary school in the community, and the other three brothers help their father with different activities on the farm.

Doña Celsa did not have the opportunity to attend school, as she comes from a family with very little economic means. But her family was hard-working, and taught her what was most important in life: moral and spiritual values. 

She thanks Almighty God for the family that she has, because in spite of not having attended school, thanks to the support of her daughters she has learned to read and write at home, and she has faith that she will continue learning more every day. 

The land that she and her family work is their own, thanks to many years of hard work and sacrifice. She has more than 14 years of experience working alongside her husband, and she also raises pigs and has a dairy cow, producing small quantities of dairy products in order to generate more income for the family.

Her plans are to be able to cultivate a different variety of produce that would help her to generate more earnings, such as corn and beans, and to install an irrigation system-- either drip or with butterfly valves--as water is abundant and clean in her village.

For this reason, she is seeking financing; to purchase agricultural supplies so that she can take care of her coffee crop, which will help her to fulfill the goals, plans, dreams, and commitments that she has today.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies for taking care of her coffee crop.

loans.name: Daniel Abisai

texts.es:
Daniel tiene 24 años de edad, sus estudios realizados son hasta bachillerato general. Se encuentra acompañado, su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen un niño de 3 años de edad. Ellos viven en casa de los papás de Daniel.

Actualmente se encuentra trabajando como vendedor en un súper mercado, tiene un año de estar trabajando en este lugar, aprendió este actividad al recibir una capacitación de animación la cual le gustó mucho y comenzó a buscar trabajo y en este lugar le dieron la oportunidad. En sus días libres se dedica a trabajar junto con su papá y hermanos en la agricultura para garantizar la seguridad alimentaria de él y su familia.

El horario de trabajo en el súper mercado es de 6:00 am a 10:00 am y 12:00 md a 4:00 pm, para llegar a su trabajo se tarda 30 minutos viajando en auto bus.


El dinero lo utilizara para comprar una motocicleta, la cual le permitiría llegar más pronto tanto a su trabajo como a su casa cuando termina la jornada laboral, esto estaría solventando la necesidad de transporte, ya que este es deficiente en la zona donde reside.


Su sueño y él de su compañera de vida, es construir su casa propia para independizarse completamente de su familia. Él sabe que para cumplir este sueño tiene que seguir dando lo mejor en su trabajo cada día para que esto se haga realidad.
texts.en: Daniel is 24 years old and his schooling went as far as high school. He's currently cohabitating with his partner who is a stay-at-home mom. They have a 3 year old child and live at Daniel's parents' house. Currently he's working as a supermarket vendor, and he's been working at this location for a year. He learned this job at a training session he attended that he enjoyed very much. Afterwards he began to look for work and this is the location where he was given an opportunity. On his days off he does agricultural work with his dad and his brothers to guarantee food security for himself and his family. The work schedule at the supermarket is 6:00 am to 10:00 am and 12:00 pm to 4:00 pm, and it takes him 30 minutes by bus to get to work. He will use the money to purchase a motorcycle, which would allow him to get to work faster as well as return home faster at the end of the work day. This would meet his need for transportation, which is scarce in his area. The dream he and his partner share is to build a house of their own to completely obtain independence from his family. He knows that to make this dream come true he has to keep doing his best at work every day.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Jerlyn

texts.en: Jerlyn is a married woman and a mother of four children from Panglao, Bohol. The youngest child is 5 while the oldest is 11 years old. She is a fish vendor. She sells fish to the people in their community. She is requesting a loan to buy Styrofoam for fish storage, ice and fish. This is very essential to make her business grow so she'll be able to purchase food for the family and pay for school expenses. Jerlyn hopes of expanding her business and making it a success.

loans.use: to buy Styrofoam for fish storage, ice and fish

loans.name: Demar

texts.en:
Demar grows crops and raises hogs within his village. He is a 25-year-old hardworking man, who has two children. Having these sources of income requires hard work and patience. 

With the aim to have a better way of living and gain greater income, Demar decided to apply for a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy pigs, feed and vitamins to make his hogs healthier upon reaching their optimum growth. He just hopes that his requested loan will be approved.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed and vitamins for his pigs.

loans.name: Mariam's Group

texts.en:
Mariam is 42 years old and lives in Lahore with her family. She has one daughter and five sons. Her husband has been running a general store for 20 years in the local area.

Mariam's husband is planning to expand his business in response to the demand of customers. For this purpose he needs to buy different commodities.

Due to his insufficient financial means he is unable to purchase these commodities. Therefore Mariam, as a member of a two-person group, has applied for the Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will improve their monthly income and profit margins. That will be help them to add to their savings for their children's education and also to improve their lifestyle.

In the picture Mariam is raising her hand. She is very glad for this opportunity and also grateful to the Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy inventoy for the general store

loans.name: Suriya's Group

texts.en:
Suriya is a member of this four-person lending group. She is a 41-year-old woman, residing in Lahore, Pakistan. She is running a clothing business with her husband. Her husband helps her in the purchase of clothes from the whole-seller. She has two sons and three daughters. This business is the only source of income to feed her family.

She has not got enough savings to buy new inventories of clothes to resell. Therefore Suriya is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan.This loan will enable them to purchase a variety of clothes to resell. This will help her to generate a good amount of income to meet her family's daily expenditures. With the help of the profit, she will save some amount for their children's bright future.

Suriya is very happy and thankful to Kiva and it's field Partner BRAC Pakistan. 

Note: In the photo Suriya raises her hand.

loans.use: To purchase clothes to resell.

loans.name: Reynalda

texts.en:
Reynalda is a married woman and a mother of six grown-up children. She lives with her family in the town of Talibon, Bohol. Reynalda has been engaged in farming with her husband for more than 30 years.She helps her husband in tilling their farm.
Reynalda is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. With this, they will be able to improve the productivity of the farm, thus augmenting their yield and income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
A hardworking mother of three children, Felicidad is from Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is 54 years old. Felicidad has been engaged in a "Sari-Sari" store (General Store) business for 14 years already and the business is doing well. She applied for her membership in PMPC in 2008 and has taken out previous loans from the coop which did help a lot in her business. 

Felicidad is planning to venture into fishing to earn additional income for their family. Recently, Felicidad requested an amount of PHP 30,000 to purchase a boat engine for the fishing activities. 

In the future, she wants to see her children finish their studies and live comfortably with them.

loans.use: to purchase a boat engine for their fishing business.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Industrial, que le permitirá lograr a ser un gran profesional para apoyar y sustentar a su familia.
Está estudiando y trabajando al mismo tiempo, lo cual es muy loable, ya que es muy sacrificado, pero él sabe que el día de mañana todo su esfuerzo tendrá recompensa.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su facultad para poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Ricardo is studying for a degree in Industrial Engineering. This will enable him to become a successful professional so that he can support and sustain his family. Ricardo is studying and working at the same time, which is quite commendable. Even though this requires a great deal of sacrifice, Ricardo knows that all of his efforts will be rewarded someday.

He is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the payment of his school expenses. This will enable him to continue his studies as before.

loans.use: to pay for his university expenses.

loans.name: Nurhabibah

texts.en:
Nurhabibah is a housewife living with four people in the family home in Bogor, a city known as "The City of Rain", located about a two-hour drive from Jakarta. Her husband is an entrepreneur. 

Nurhabibah runs a small stall that sells snacks, drinks, groceries, and mobile phone airtime credits, and processes bill payments. She felt interested in joining Ruma because she wanted to try selling Ruma products, and she is glad that her business is assisted and supported by Ruma agents. This way, Nurhabibah can improve her entrepreneurial skills and her business. 

As her business continues, she hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to process more mobile phone airtime credits and bill payment transactions on weekends. For the last three months, she has had around $72-$73 per day in sales just from selling mobile phone airtime credits. Nurhabibah plans to seek more business opportunities and put aside the extra cash for her children's education. 

In the photo, Nurhabibah is standing in front of her stall. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone airtime credits and bill payment transactions on weekends

loans.name: Abasolo (Flat) Group

texts.es:
Anahí es una de las integrantes del grupo Abasolo(flat), ella se reunió con dos mujeres más para conformar este grupo ya que tienen en común el ser comerciantes y querer brindar a sus familias una mejor calidad de vida. Este grupo se encuentra ubicado en Tierra Blanca, mejor conocido como "La Novia del Sol" ya que en el verano el calor es muy fuerte. La principal fuente de empleo en esta región, proviene del comercio y de la ganadería. 
Anahí tiene 30 años de edad, estudio la preparatoria, esta casada y tiene un hijo, ella platica que desde hace 5 años decidió iniciar a trabajar para ganar su propio dinero y poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar así que inicio a vender cosméticos y ropa interior por catalogo. Ella realizas sus ventas en su tiempo libre, siempre por las tardes, y va mostrando sus catálogos a sus amigos y vecinos. Al platicar acerca de lo que más de agrada de su actividad comenta que le ha dado la oportunidad de conocer a muchas personas así como la de mejorar su vida. Anahí solicitó un crédito a VisionFund ya que desea invertir en la compra de variedad de ropa interior y de cosméticos(esmaltes, perfumes, maquillajes, desodorantes, cremas) para resurtir su negocio. Anahí espera que este crédito le ayude a incrementar sus ventas, en un futuro le gustaría que su hijo tenga la oportunidad de estudiar la universidad.

Las otras dos integrantes del grupo son: 
Nelly: venta de calzado, oro lamidado y plata
Tomasa: venta de topper y comida
texts.en:
Anahí is a member of the group Abasolo(Flat). She joined with two other women to form this group as they have in common the fact that they are merchants and want to provide their families with a better quality of life. This group is located in Tierra Blanca, better known as "La Novia del Sol" or "Sun Bride" because the summer is very hot. The main source of employment in the this region is in trade and livestock.
Anahí is 30 years old. She studied in school, is married and has a son. She says that it has been 5 years since she decided to begin to work to gain her own income and help her husband with the expenses of the household. She began selling cosmetics and undergarments by catalog. She conducts sales in her free time, always in the evenings, and is showing her catalogs to her friends and neighbors. In talking about what she likes about her job, she says that she has been given the opportunity of meeting many people, as well as improving their lives. Anahí requested a loan from VisionFund as she wants to invest in the purchase of a variety of undergarments and cosmetics (nail polish, perfumes, mascara, makeup, cremes) to restock her business. Anahí hopes that this loan helps her to increase her sales. In the future she would like her son to have the opportunity to study at university.

The other members of the group are:

Nelly: Sells footwear, laminated gold and silver
Tomasa: sale of topper and food

loans.use: to purchase a variety of undergarments and cosmetics.

loans.name: Sadbarg

texts.ru:
Садбарг сельская женщина родом из района Хамадони. Ей 56 лет. Ее мужа нет в живых. Она вдова с пятерьмя детьми. Двое ее сыновей в настоящее время находятся за пределами страны на заработках. 
Садбарг вот уже три года как занимается животноводством. Она сама ухаживает за коровами и бычками. Уже вошло в привычку каждый день поить и кормить скот. Она не представляет свою жизнь без сельского хозяйства и животных. Она получает с деятельности не только доход, но и удовольствие. Садбарг запрашивает кредит, чтобы закупить пару молодых бычков и увеличить поголовье скота. Кредит поможет ей увеличить финансовый бюджет семьи.
texts.en: Sadbarg is a rural woman originally from the Hamadoni region. She is 56 years old. Her husband is no longer alive. She is a widow with five children. Two of her sons have currently relocated abroad for work. Sadbarg has already been involved in agriculture for three years. She raises cows and bulls. She is in the habit of feeding and giving the cattle something to drink every day. Her life would not be the same without agriculture and animals. She receives from these activities, not only an income, but also joy. Sadbarg is requesting a loan, for the purchase of a couple of young bulls and to increase her livestock. This loan will help increase her family's financial budget.

loans.use: To purchase two head of steer.

loans.name: Ameer

texts.en:
Ameer is a 48-year-old lady residing in Punjab, Pakistan. She lives with her family consisting of her spouse and two children. She belongs to a lower-income family and does a business reselling clothes. She is well-known seller of quality clothes in her area. 

She is requesting a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan, because she has to purchase different types of clothes in bulk for reselling purposes. After the reselling process she will get a favorable profit and effective sales growth.

This will help her to make positive changes in her family, and she will enable her to make savings for her family's future needs. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy clothes in bulk for reselling purposes.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian vive en Encarnación, trabaja en un estudio jurídico ya hace mas de 5 años, actualmente está cursando el último año de la carrera de derecho y comenta que su principal objetivo es de recibirse e independizarse para su mejor manejo y seguir trabajando en su rama.
Es una mujer muy sacrificada ya que estudia y trabaja al mismo tiempo, y es eso lo que la destaca. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, ya que está a punto de terminar sus estudios y tendrá muchos gastos que cubrir.
texts.en:
Mirian lives in Encarnación and has been working at a law firm for more than five years. She is currently in her final year of her law degree program. Mirian says that her main goal is to receive her degree and become independent. This would be the best way for her to manage her career and continue working in her field.

Mirian is a self-sacrificing woman who is studying and working at the same time, which is something that should be noted. She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in her degree expenses. Mirian is at the point in which she is about to finish her degree and there are many expenses that need to be covered.

loans.use: to pay for her law degree expenses.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is residing in Punjab, Pakistan. She is a 52-year-old woman living with her spouse and 4 children. Her husband has been running a restaurant for 20 years in the local market among multiple competitors. Therefore he makes an effort to provide quality and delicious food to the running customers and the other shopkeepers and salesman of the market.

Her husband needs to buy some food items like a variety of vegetables, chicken, rice, salt and other food items for his restaurant. To fulfill this need, Yasmeen is applying for a loan from Kiva's Field Partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will allow her husband to get maximum profit that will enable him to meet the regular expenses of their daily routine.

She is very thankful to KIVA and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy some food items like a variety of vegetables, chicken, rice, salt, etc., for restaurant

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is residing in Punjab, Pakistan. She is a 46-year-old woman living with her spouse, 4 daughters and 2 sons. Her husband is running a restaurant in the local market among the multiple competitors. Therefore he makes an effort to provide quality and delicious food to the running customers and other shopkeepers and salesman of the market.

Her husband needs to buy some food items like sugar, rice, milk and different kinds of vegetables for his restaurant to sell a variety of dishes. To fulfill this need, Parveen is applying for a loan from Kiva's Field Partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will also help her husband to get maximum profit that will enable him to meet the regular expanses of their daily routine.

She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy foods items like sugar, rice, milk and different kinds of vegetables for her husband's restaurant for reselling purposes

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria está estudiando la carrera de prótesis dental, que le permitirá ayudar a las personas que necesitan atención bucal.
Su sueño es poder ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo, y es por eso que está esforzándose por cumplirlo.
Pide este préstamo para poder montar su propio taller que le será de mucha ayuda para sus prácticas de prótesis.
texts.en:
Maria is studying for a degree in Dental Prosthetics, which would allow to assist people in need of dental care. Her dream is to be able to help her family through her work. For this reason, she strives to complete her degree.

Maria is requesting this loan so she can establish her own workshop, which will be a great help in her practice of making prostethics.

loans.use: to establish a laboratory for making dental prostethics.

loans.name: Lidia Del Socorro

texts.es: Lidia es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos varios. Es casada, tiene 6 hijos, quienes  son independientes a ella. Su esposo hace algunos meses sufrió un accidente muy grave, por lo qué ahora no está trabajando. Lidia tiene que hacer un esfuerzo extra para poder llevar la manutención de su familia ella sola. Con el crédito solicitado Lidia terminará unas divisiones en su vivienda, comprará gypsum, perlines y demás materiales necesarios, espera poder terminar estas mejoras y así tener más comodidad.
texts.en:
Lidia works in sales, selling clothing and other products. She is married and has six adult children. Her husband was in a very serious accident a few months ago and is not currently working. Lidia has to put in extra effort to support the family by herself.

Lidia is requesting this loan to finish some dividing walls in her home, for which she will buy sheets of drywall, beams (purlins) and other necessary materials. She hopes to finish these renovations to improve the comfort of her home.

loans.use: to buy sheets of drywall, beams (purlins) and other necessary materials to build dividing walls in her home.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is 26 years old and lives with her spouse and three children. She is a simple housewife and her husband provides transport services by driving an auto rickshaw. He is the only earning person who is feeding his family and fulfilling all their needs.

The present condition of his rickshaw is not good condition, so he is unable to work efficiently. Her husband does not have enough financial means to purchase a new rickshaw body. Therefore, his wife, Martha, is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, she will purchase the new rickshaw body for her husband's business so that he can provide a smooth transport facility and continue generating a good amount of income to fulfill his family's needs.

It will also be a positive initiative for them to make favorable savings to fulfill their upcoming needs. She is also very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase a new rickshaw body for her husband's business.

loans.name: Asma's Group

texts.en:
Asma is a housewife with five children. She has three sons and two daughters, and belongs to Lahore, Pakistan. Her age is 39 years. Currently, she is running a boutique and sewing clothes. She is providing tailoring services to the native women and her boutique is well known in the area.

She is requesting a group loan with 9 other members from Kiva's Field partner BRAC Pakistan. Because she has to purchase different types of cloth to make designer dresses and sell them at a profitable price, the loan will also help her to get reasonable profit.

She wants to upgrade her living standards and want to support her entire family with sufficient financial means.

Asma is very thankful to KIVA and BRAC Pakistan. 

Note: Asma is raising her hand in the photo.

loans.use: To buy cloth to sew designer dresses.

loans.name: Bonfil Group

texts.es:
Bonfil es el nombre de un grupo integrado por 12 mujeres alegres y emprendedoras, cada una de ellas desarrolla una actividad económica con el objetivo de dar a sus familias una mejor calidad de vida. Este grupo se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad de nombre Novara la cual es muy conocida por estar ubicada a orilla de la carretera federal y cuya principal fuente de empleo es el comercio. 

Margarita es una de los miembros de este grupo, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora de 50 años de edad, es soltera y tiene una hija. Ella platica que solo tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta el cuarto grado de primaria  y su madre le enseñó a tejer y a bordar para que aprendiera una actividad y pudiera ganar un poco de dinero y ayudar a solventar sus propios gastos. Sin embargo, no fue sino hasta hace 30 años que Margarita decidió iniciar a hacer sus productos para vender y poder contribuir con el gasto de su hogar, ella realiza ropa y zapatos tejidos, servilletas y manteles bordados, sus ventas las realiza de manera ambulante y en algunas ocasiones trabaja de acuerdo con los pedidos que le hacen las personas que ya la conocen. Un crédito de VisionFund le ayudara a comprar gran variedad de hilos, servilletas, suelas, agujas y ganchos para continuar con su actividad. Ella espera que su negocio continíe prosperando y aumenten sus ganancias para seguir apoyando a su hija con sus estudios.

Los demás integrantes del grupo son:

Guadalupe  venta de calzado 
Cirila venta de antojitos 
Alejandrina venta de antijitos 
Martha venta de antojitos 
Leticia venta de comida
Adriana venta de ropa 
Karen venta de bisutería 
María del Carmen venta ropa 
Magdalena venta de comida 
Araceli venta de antojitos 
Rosalina venta de cerámica
texts.en:
Bonfil is the name of a group made up of 12 happy and enterprising women. Each one of them has her own business with the aim of giving their families a better quality of life. This group is located in the community named Novara, which is very known for being situated by the side of the federal highway and whose primary source of employment is commerce.

Margarita is one of the members of this group. She is a very hardworking, 50-year old woman. She is single and has one daughter. She says that she only had the opportunity to study through the fourth grade of primary school. Her mother taught her to knit and do embroidery so that she could learn a business and earn a little money to help cover her own expenses. However, it wasn't until 30 years ago that Margarita decided to start making products to sell and to be able to help with household expenses. She makes knitted clothes and shoes, and embroidered napkins and tablecloths.

She makes her sales from door to door, and she sometimes works on orders placed by people who already know her.

A loan from VisionFund will help her to buy a wide variety of threads, napkins, soles, needles and hooks in order to continue her business. She hopes that her business continues prospering and that her earnings increase so that she can continue supporting her daughter in her studies.

The rest of the group members are:

Guadalupe -- shoe sales

Cirila -- sale of corn-based snacks

Alejandrina -- sale of corn-based snacks

Martha -- sale of corn-based snacks

Leticia -- food sales

Adriana -- clothing sales

Karen -- sale of costume jewelry

María del Carmen -- clothing sales

Magdalena -- food sales

Araceli -- sale of corn-based snacks

Rosalina -- pottery sales.

loans.use: to buy a variety of threads, napkins, needles and hooks.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a forty-seven-year old man married with nine children living in Bundibugyo,Uganda. He has been a cocoa farmer since 2003. He also buys from other farmers and sells the cocoa to one of the leading agents in the area known as ESCO Uganda.

He dreams of buying more land to expand his gardens and employ casual labor to work there plus paying school fees for his children. He is only affected by inadequate capital to maintain his cocoa.

James intends to use the loan to buy more cocoa to sell and get more profits.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell

loans.name: Agaba

texts.en:
Agaba, a timber dealer from Kagadi Uganda, is 40 years old and a father of four children who all attend school. Having started with animal keeping and sale of the local brew known as waragi by the locals, he has been able to grow his business and meet his family needs. He was motivated to start up this business by the poverty that he grew up in and vowed to give a better life to his family. He is challenged by the bad roads that affect transportation of his timber. In future, he plans to educate his children to the university level. 

Agaba will use the loan to buy timber to sell.

loans.use: to buy timber to sell.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is a Ugandan male aged 43 who lives in Kagadi. He used a previous loan to buy more maize to sell. His passion for agriculture led him to start a produce-selling business to earn a daily income eleven years ago. He dreams of buying a car to help him in the transportation of his stock to the city and to build a permanent residential house. George has asked for a loan to buy maize, beans, and ground nuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize, beans, and ground nuts to sell.

loans.name: Urpis De Confraternidad Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Giovana tiene 34 años de edad es soltera y tiene 01 hijo,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa,la socia vende en uno de los centros comerciales de la ciudad del Cusco,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicandose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar mercaderia como polos entre otros. 

Los socios que salen adjuntos a la foto pidieron permiso para llegar tarde por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de venta de regalos, ferretería, tienda de abarrotes y artesanía. 

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
These are the members of the communal bank “URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD”. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

Giovana is a member of this group. She is 34 years old, single, and has one son. She alternates her daily household work with her business of selling clothing, which she sells in one of the shopping centers in the city of Cusco. She has had this business for some time now, and it does well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into it each day. She is a responsible and hardworking person, which is how she provides for her family.

Giovana is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as shirts and other items.

The members in the thumbnail-sized photos requested permission to arrive late because of work.

The businesses of the other members of the group include selling gifts, a hardware store, a grocery store and making artisanal products.

Giovana is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shirts and other items.

loans.name: Karen Danesia

texts.es:
Karen tiene 35 años de edad, es casada y madre de 2 hijos quienes están en primaria en diferentes grados de educación. Tiene un grado de estudio de secundaria completo graduándose como perito mercantil y contador público gracias al apoyo moral y financiero por parte de sus padres a quienes ella agradece el esfuerzo para que ella pudiese estudiar y graduarse. Karen junto a su esposo trabajan en la agricultura pero ella también trabaja como oficial de negocios en una institución privada de cable desde hace 4 años. Cuentan con 2 manzanas de tierra las cuales fueron obtenidas gracias a una herencia en la cual tienen cultivada café como un ingreso económico más para la familia poniendo de su parte para que este esté bien cuidado, limpio de plagas y enfermedades pero principalmente atractivo para sus clientes.  
Sus planes para el futuro poder comprar un vehículo para poder movilizarse junto a su esposo hasta sus cultivos de café ya que de esa forma ella también podrá facilitar el acarreo de los insumos que son necesarios para sus cultivos. También ella sueña con poder comprar una manzana más de tierra para poder expandir sus cultivos de café ya que junto a su propiedad hay una la cual le gustaría obtener para seguir cultivando.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de café mismos con los que espera obtener excelentes ingresos para poder cumplir con su compromiso de pago para seguir gozando de los beneficios que la cooperativa COMIXMUL le ofrece.
texts.en:
Karen is 35 years old, married, and the mother of two children who are in different grades in primary school. Thanks to the financial and moral support of her parents, Karen completed secondary school and graduated as a certified business expert and accountant. She is very grateful to them for their efforts to make sure that she could study and graduate.
 
Karen and her husband work in agriculture, and Karen has also worked as a business officer in a private cable company for the past 4 years. They have 2 blocks of land which they obtained thanks to an inheritance, and on which they grow coffee as an additional income source for the family. They put in their time so that the land is well taken care of, free of pests and disease; and especially so that it is attractive to their customers.

Karen's plan for the future is to purchase a vehicle which she and her husband will use to travel to and from their land, and to facilitate the transport of the supplies they need for their crops. She also dreams of being able to purchase another block of land in order to expand their coffee cultivation. There is actually a piece of land next to their property that they would like to obtain and begin cultivating. 

Today they have requested financing to purchase agricultural supplies which will support their coffee crops. They hope to obtain excellent earnings in order to fulfill their obligations to pay and to continue reaping the benefits offered by the cooperative COMIXMUL.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to support her coffee crop.

loans.name: Dilmurod

texts.en:
Dilmurod is 33 years old. He is hard-working and smart man. 

Dilmurod has been busy growing agriculture products for more than ten years. He grows potatoes and wheat. He has his own land. He also has an animal husbandry business. Since Dilmurod lives in a rural area, he has a good opportunity to develop his agriculture business. 

Dilmurod is married and has five children. He is the main feeder of his family. His wife helps him with managing the business. 

Dilmurod wants to make a new sowing. He is asking for a loan of TJS 9,000 (somoni) to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer, and a cow for increasing working capital. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer, and a cow for increasing working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition fees.
